contest-event.event-date:
July 10, 1886 D Belle Vue July Contest
Belle Vue July Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Belle Vue July Contest belle-vue-july-contest
I Puritani [arr. Godfrey]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes: £25, £20, £15, £12, £8 1st annual contest Open to any band which had not won a prize at any of the September Belle Vue contests during the last 4 years. 40 bands entered, only 20 were accepted to compete. Bury Borough disqualified for breach of rules.
April 17, 2011, 7:08 p.m. Nov. 30, 2017, 10:19 a.m.
1 Glossop Volunteers Thomas German
2 Heywood Rifles Band John Gladney Jnr
3 Rochdale Old Edwin Swift
4 St. James Gorton Joseph Gaggs
5 Lindley Band Edwin Swift
